channel.title: Eclipse Evolution 2.8
channel.description:
About Eclipse :
Eclipse is a free to use 2D game engine. This game creator makes online mmorpgs.
No previous knowledge is necessary becouse Eclipse uses a simple point and click system.
If the software does not have the requirements you need you can program it with the source.
Quick Start Guide If you are new to Eclipse i suggest first reading a tutorial to get started with your gaming adventures. While the program may be easy to use it can be frustrating to a new user. A good tutorial can be found here(http://www.touchofdeathforums.com/smf/index.php/topic,36286.0.html). If you are just looking to quick start your adventures you must open your server before opening your client or else it will say that the server is offline.
If you get the runtime error 339 then you have not downloaded the Library Files(http://www.freemmorpgmaker.com/LibraryFiles.zip).
Remember, Eclipse is a easy to use. But to create a truly fabulous games with this mmorpg maker time and effort will have to be put forward into your masterpiece. Story lines, sprites, graphic interfaces these are all key essences in making the difference between a simple game and a truly unique mmorpg that will go places or generate revenue. The eclipse game engine has the capability to create professional games but it takes the user to truly harness that power.
http://freemmorpgmaker.com/index.php
ScreenShots:
http://freemmorpgmaker.com/screenshots.php
have fun.
Credits to:
Death Production marsh theyellowmole tpher

item.description:
@twins wrote:

About Eclipse :

Eclipse is a free to use 2D game engine. This game creator makes online mmorpgs.

No previous knowledge is necessary becouse Eclipse uses a simple point and click system.

If the software does not have the requirements you need you can program it with the source.

Quick Start Guide
If you are new to Eclipse i suggest first reading a tutorial to get started with your gaming adventures. While the program may be easy to use it can be frustrating to a new user. A good tutorial can be found here(http://www.touchofdeathforums.com/smf/index.php/topic,36286.0.html). If you are just looking to quick start your adventures you must open your server before opening your client or else it will say that the server is offline.

If you get the runtime error 339 then you have not downloaded the Library Files(http://www.freemmorpgmaker.com/LibraryFiles.zip).

Remember, Eclipse is a easy to use. But to create a truly fabulous games with this mmorpg maker time and effort will have to be put forward into your masterpiece. Story lines, sprites, graphic interfaces these are all key essences in making the difference between a simple game and a truly unique mmorpg that will go places or generate revenue. The eclipse game engine has the capability to create professional games but it takes the user to truly harness that power.

Intersect Engine - Free 2D MMORPG Maker

Intersect Engine - Free 2D MMORPG Maker

Your completely free and fully featured 2D MMORPG Maker. Design with friends, and share your game with the world. Click here to get started!
